description: Marriage is a very serious step that one should think through very carefully. This boy wanted to marry the girl he was with for a year and a half. I wasn´t sure if she didn´t push him into it but that wasn´t my business. So our boy had to organize a wedding. And more importantly, pay for it. Wedding is not exactly a cheap matter. He learned that very quickly as he had to gather 25 000 just to pay the advance. He was almost broke and his girlfriend was breathing down his neck. Maybe she was pregnant, who knows. Anyways, our boy was desperate. He sat there on his bed and told me everything. He looked like he would burst into tears at any moment. Simply adorable. I couldn´t wait to stuff my cock inside him.
title: Debt Dandy 217
